data.eml:eml: Two new species of the genus Phobeticomyia from China (Diptera, Lauxaniidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shi, Li, Li, Wenliang, Yang, Ding (2009): Two new species of the genus Phobeticomyia from China (Diptera, Lauxaniidae). Zootaxa 2090: 57-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.187466
